Smart Toothbrush with AI Technology: Create an electric toothbrush with artificial intelligence that can detect when you're not brushing correctly and provide real-time feedback to improve your brushing technique. The toothbrush could also have a built-in app that tracks your brushing habits and provides personalized recommendations to optimize your oral hygiene.

Portable Toothbrush with Built-in Toothpaste Dispenser: Design an electric toothbrush that comes with a built-in toothpaste dispenser, eliminating the need for separate toothpaste tubes. The dispenser could be powered by a small battery or solar panel, making it easy to use while traveling.

Toothbrush with Customizable Bristle Heights: Develop an electric toothbrush with interchangeable bristle heights, allowing users to customize their brushing experience based on their individual needs. This could be particularly beneficial for people with sensitive teeth or gums.

Toothbrush with Built-in Mouthwash Dispenser: Create an electric toothbrush that comes with a built-in mouthwash dispenser, providing an all-in-one oral hygiene solution. The dispenser could be designed to release a precise amount of mouthwash with each brush stroke, ensuring effective cleaning and fresh breath.

Personalized Toothbrush with Customizable Brush Heads: Design an electric toothbrush that allows users to switch between different brush heads based on their oral health needs. For example, a user could have a brush head with softer bristles for sensitive teeth, or a brush head with firmer bristles for better plaque removal. This would provide a more personalized brushing experience and help users maintain optimal oral hygiene.
